alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued October 16 at 2:26AM MDT until October 17 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Sanpete Valley, particularly between Moroni and Manti. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
